CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The device efficiency initially increases upon the incorporation of longer alkyl side chains from decyl to tetradecyl reaching a maximum at tetradecyl-substituted PffBB-14 and then declines with further alkyl side chain extension.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-14 |
| Tetradecyl |

I removed "decyl" from the list as it is not a material name, but rather a chemical substance.

| --- |
| device efficiency |
| alkyl side chains |
| tetradecyl-substituted PffBB-14 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| device efficiency |
| tetradecyl-substituted PffBB-14 |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "alkyl side chains" (this is a general term that could refer to any alkyl-containing material, and not specifically a property of the material)

Therefore, the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph are:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| device efficiency |
| tetradecyl-substituted PffBB-14 |
